name: Shark Water
description:
This is a One Button game for GMTK Jam 2019, the theme being only one.

Experience the life of a shark as you must eat, dodge deep sea mines, and of course never stop swimming! Pressing space bar accelerates your shark and turns you in the opposite direction, time your presses correctly to navigate the ocean and to build up speed! 

Created by:

Gabe  &  Heather

Created using Construct 3
